name: VRStageParameters
description: This is an experimental technology Because this technology's specification has not stabilized, check the compatibility table for usage in various browsers. Also note that the syntax and behavior of an experimental technology is subject to change in future versions of browsers as the specification changes. The VRStageParameters interface of the WebVR API represents the values describing the the stage area for devices that support room-scale experiences.

members.name: VRStageParameters.sittingToStandingTransform
members.description: Contains a matrix that transforms the sitting-space view matrices of VRFrameData to standing-space.

members.name: VRStageParameters.sizeX
members.description: Returns the width of the play-area bounds in meters.

members.name: VRStageParameters.sizeY
members.description: Returns the depth of the play-area bounds in meters.
